entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning near midnight then changing to flurries before morning. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
